actor

Class PersonTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • actor.PersonTest

  • public class PersonTest
extends Object
    JUnit test to test the methods in class Person.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Andrew Dallow

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PersonTest() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void setUp()
      Create a test Person to be used in following tests along with 2 test Thing's and 2 test Room's.
      void testAge()
      Conform that getAge works for each scenario.
      void testDrop()
      Confirm that drop removes Thing's from inventory and adds them to the contents of the current location.
      void testEat()
      Confirm that eat() removes food from world.
      void testInventory()
      Confirm that inventory returns empty when Person is not carrying anything or returns the collection of Things Person is carrying.
      void testLocation()
      Confirm that location() returns the location of testRoom1, once Person has been set to this location.
      void testMoveTo()
      Confirm that moveTo() changes the location of the Person.
      void testName()
      Confirm that name() returns the name of Person.
      void testTake()
      Confirm that take adds Thing's to inventory and removes it from contents of the current room.
      void testToString()
      Confirm that toString returns either just the Persons name or the name and location.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
